text: Wayne Brett Westner (28 September 1961 - 4 January 2017) was a South African golfer. He turned professional in 1982. He had a total of 13 wins in his career. He was best known for his 1993 Dubai Desert Classic win. He also won the World Cup of Golf in 1996 with Ernie Els. His career ended in 1998 because of injury. He was born in Johannesburg. Westner was involved in a hostage event on 4 January 2017 at his home in Pennington, KwaZulu-Natal. He later committed suicide (killed himself) with a gunshot wound to his head at his home. He was 55. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1961 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Johannesburg Category:South African golfers Category:Sportspeople who committed suicide Category:Suicides by firearm
title: Wayne Westner
